text: Mona Barrie (18 December 1909 â€“ 27 June 1964) was an English actress in American movies and theater. She played Helen Anders in I Met Him in Paris. She also played Stephanie in Something to Sing About. Barrie was born in London, England. She died, age 54, in Los Angeles.
